info.about: MAGARMACSH division of ASA Industries aims to significantly impact the availability of hygiene and sanitation solutions for India. The company manufactures Home Care Products for consumers under the brand name of Magarmach at a highly affordable price.

welcomeCard.title: Manufacturing
welcomeCard.content: Our Manufacturing facilities are located at at Kaithi, Uttar Pradesh..

welcomeCard.title: Market Presence
welcomeCard.content: We support the on-field sales team through round-the-clock Marketing and Technical support.

welcomeCard.title: R & D
welcomeCard.content: We have a team of consultants who specialize in various products of the Industry.

welcomeCard.title: Contact
welcomeCard.content: Please feel free to communicate with us 24/7.

testCard.name: Hament Gupta
testCard.message: I am very happy with Spru Products, they are very friendly    and always ready to take new challenge . We closed several great clients  in Utter Pradesh as well India also.

testCard.name: Dinesh Jaiswal
testCard.message: I am totally surprise with quality, Amazing Products with best quality. ASA Toilet Cleaner is superb ... Well Done Spru!

testCard.name: Anil Kumar Mathur
testCard.message: Kitchen Product range is quite impressive. It will be good option for hotel industry. Highly Recommended..

sections.heading: Our Manufacturing Unit
sections.para: We have a huge and well-structured manufacturing unit, which helps us in completing the tasks of producing Eco Series House Cleaning Produccts and chemicals within a stipulated timeframe. It is equipped with technologically advanced machinery that are upgraded as per latest industrial trends.

sections.heading: Our Warehousing Structure
sections.para: We have a huge warehousing structure that helps us in storing the toilet cleaners safely until they are approved for transportation to our customers. Our warehouse keepers maintain a suitable temperature at our warehouse.

sections.heading: Why Choose Us?
sections.para: Customers have trusted us with our products owing to the high quality of the products. Some major factors behind our success are: Eco Friendly Products • Wide distribution network • Capacious warehouse • Competitive prices • Well-structured infrastructure

sections.heading: Trust
sections.para: We are honest and direct in our dealings and always act with transparency. We say what we mean, mean what we say and always keep our promises. Trust is at the very core of everything we do. If people trust us, they want to be associated with us. It is that simple.

sections.heading: Respect
sections.para: We respect our team members, stakeholders, heritage and universe. Because it is a shared journey, we always seek a win-win outcome.

sections.heading: Commitment
sections.para: We are committed to being sustainable over long term through focus and depth in everything we do.

sections.heading: Courage
sections.para: We want to surround ourselves with bold thinkers and to always act with conviction.

sections.heading: Humility
sections.para: We endeavor to keep learning and letting our actions speak louder than our words. We also appreciate that everyone we interact with has a contribution to make to our well-being.

sections.heading: VISION
sections.para: To make every Indian household daily user of ASA

sections.heading: MISSION
sections.para: To create a place for ASA in Indian House Cleaning Products and hygiene solution

sections.heading: VALUES
sections.para: The ASA Family culture guided by our vision statement. We believe in making the wellbeing and satisfaction of our customers the basis of every decision for the business and the product. The quality of our products and the loyalty of our customers are a testimony to the above statement.

links.file: ASA MSDS OF ASA TOILET CLEANER

glass.title: Glass Cleaner
glass.desc: Glass Cleaner is an excellent product made with an ultra-advance formula for easy and effortless cleaning of Glass, Mirror, Windshield, Plastic, Laminated items etc. Our Liquid Glass Cleaner gives a sparkling new like finish to the surface without leaving any streaks or spots on the surface. These Liquid Glass Cleaners can be used for cleaning many home use items like Refrigerator, laptops, computers, laminated items, stains of door handles and surrounding areas etc.
benefit: Multi Surface-glass, Mirrors, Chrome & Stainless Steel

surface.title: Surface Cleaner
surface.desc: ASA Surface Cleaner is an extra strong cleaning material which is tough on stains, helps fighting and cleaning oily and greasy floor surfaces. It is a brilliant cleaner and cleans all washable surfaces. Along with cleaning, it respects the natural beauty and shine of your delicate surfaces everyday of the year. Use Strong solution for deep scaling marks. It is best suited for housekeeping scrubber machines.
benefit: Heavy duty formulation to remove the toughest of scale formation.
Removes all types of scales and stains caused by hard water and mineral deposits.

floor.title: Floor Cleaner
floor.desc: We are here to introduce a large variety of superior quality Floor Cleaners that are available in different sizes of packaging. These are widely acclaimed by our valued clients for their eco-friendliness, excellent consistency and easy usage. Our offered products are used for cleaning floors in hospitals, homes, banks, offices and other places. Floor Cleaners are eminent in preventing germs, bacteria, dirt, dust etc. In addition to this, these are accustomed with refreshing smell which gives the environment a nice fragrance. The said liquids provide extra shine to the floors and keep it clean all day long.
benefit: Surface enhancer helps maintain the floor finish/polish.

toilet.title: Toilet Cleaner
toilet.desc: You will get a huge range of best quality Toilet Cleaners here at Spru Products Pvt. Ltd. These are formulated for cleaning toilet seats and floors. In addition to this, the said products are widely found in residential and commercial places. Our offered liquids perfectly clean the floors and keep the surrounding free from germs, viruses, bacteria for the prevention of unwanted infections. These Toilet Cleaners are available in different sizes of plastic containers. Furthermore, the offered liquids have high cleaning abilities and anti-bacterial properties. These are accustomed with accurate composition, maximum reliability, thick consistency, and optimum service.
benefit: Fast action cleaner for your toilet.
The anti-bacterial formula helps remove stains and residues of biological debris.
Disinfects as it cleans and leaves freshness after application.

green.title: Green Toilet Cleaner
green.desc: You will get a huge range of best quality Toilet Cleaners here at Spru Products Pvt. Ltd. These are formulated for cleaning toilet seats and floors. In addition to this, the said products are widely found in residential and commercial places. Our offered liquids perfectly clean the floors and keep the surrounding free from germs, viruses, bacteria for the prevention of unwanted infections. These Toilet Cleaners are available in different sizes of plastic containers. Furthermore, the offered liquids have high cleaning abilities and anti-bacterial properties. These are accustomed with accurate composition, maximum reliability, thick consistency, and optimum service.
benefit: Fast action cleaner for your toilet.
The anti-bacterial formula helps remove stains and residues of biological debris.
Disinfects as it cleans and leaves freshness after application.

dish_washer.title: Dish Washer
dish_washer.desc: ASA's Liquid Dish-wash and Gel come with citrus essence and are suitable for all kinds of utensils. Doubly powered with vinegar and lime, these products clean toughest grease and dirt stains very easily. While strong anti-smelling properties of vinegar remove all kinds of food odours, lime cleans greasy surface. Its superior technology also prevents scratching.
benefit: Anti corrosive properties prevent rust and re-deposition of dirt
pH balanced and safe for hands

room_freshner.title: Room Freshner
room_freshner.desc: Go through our wide range of Room Freshener, manufactured using high-grade material and upgraded technology by our skilled workers. This freshener is mainly used in homes or commercial interiors such as restrooms, hallways, lobbies, and other areas too. This freshener is a product that is designed for removing unpleasant odours from the living areas. This product basically delivers fragrance into the air and gives an awesome feeling. Air Freshener is mostly preferred for its beautiful fragrance which lasts for a longer time and makes your area fresh.
benefit: Suitable for Room, Car, Lobby etc.

airfreshner.title: Air Freshner
airfreshner.desc: Go through our wide range of Room Freshener, manufactured using high-grade material and upgraded technology by our skilled workers. This freshener is mainly used in homes or commercial interiors such as restrooms, hallways, lobbies, and other areas too. This freshener is a product that is designed for removing unpleasant odours from the living areas. This product basically delivers fragrance into the air and gives an awesome feeling. Air Freshener is mostly preferred for its beautiful fragrance which lasts for a longer time and makes your area fresh.
benefit: Suitable for Room, Car, Lobby etc.

dish_wash_bar.title: Dish Wash Bar
dish_wash_bar.desc: ASA Dish wash Bar is an ideal dish washing surfactant. It does not harm your skin. It removes the toughest grease and gives you a pleasant cleaning experience with its refreshing lemon fragrance. ASA Dish wash bar keeps your utensils looking new for longer as it cleans without scratching the surface. A great value for money product that guarantees overall satisfaction.
benefit: Anti corrosive properties prevent rust and re-deposition of dirt
pH balanced and safe for hands

bleach.title: ASA Bleach
bleach.desc: ASA Bleach is an all-fabric bleach that is a gentle bleaching agent. It removes stains, whitens and brightens laundry, and is safe for use on almost all washable white and collared fabrics. Because of its chemical ingredients, it works more slowly than chlorine bleach, is less corrosive and damaging to fibers, and is more environmentally friendly.
benefit: ASA Bleach assures whiteness & removes tough stains
Suitable for use on White Cottons & Terrycots
Lets nothing come in the way of dazzling whites, not even tough stains

bathroom.title: Bathroom Cleaner
bathroom.desc: ASA Bathroom Cleaner cleanses, shines, disinfects, and kills practically all harmful germs, viruses, and bacteria from the surface. It expertly removes meld, mildew, fungi, and all organic stains. It eliminates odor and spores by destroying the source. Safe and ideal for bathroom fittings, bathtubs, shower areas, tiles, floors, sinks, and grouts. It is ecologically safe to dispose of down the drains as enzymes will carry on breaking down organic matter.

napthalene.title: White Napthalene Ball
napthalene.desc: Let’s have a look at Naphthalene Ball provided by our company, manufactured using super quality compounds by our skilled workers. This ball is used for preventing germs and bugs from eating clothes. It is a type of chemical pesticide with a good fragrance used as a rodent, squirrel, cockroaches, and bat repellent. This ball kills insects and may also repel many animals.
benefit: Suitable for Bed, Cupboard, Washroom etc.

handwash_liquid.title: Handwash Liquid
handwash_liquid.desc: Complete range of liquid hand wash from ASA is manufactured using floral extracts and natural color that very effectively removes germs and dirt. Our products are gentle on the skin, producing a deep cleansing and moisturizing effect. These are available in two flavors - floral and herbal. This wash is made using high-grade material and upgraded technology by our skilled workers.

black.title: Black Floor Cleaner
black.desc: ASA Black Floor cleaner contains a unique formulation that kills most of the germs and gives better germs protection than standard phenyls, keeping the whole house cleaners, shiners and germs free. ASA Black floor cleaner saves you from harmful germs while keeping you and your family clean. Perfect for floors, tiles, sinks and all other washable surfaces.
benefit: Suitable For All Types Of Floors

power.title: ASA Power
benefit: Suitable For All Types Of Floors
